text:
@mattgaetz We have 40m unemployed, we are trillions in debt, 2.5m infected with COVID19  & 125,000 Americans dead, & a traitor in the WH who won't say boo to Putin for putting a bounty on American troops in Afghanistan. Sure, we are living in paradise. 
#VoteBidenToSaveAmerica2020
